tool.name: tool_2

param.name: GRIDS
param.dialogReference:
Grid(s)

Grid list, input

The SAGA grids to be exported.

param.name: FILE
param.dialogReference:
File

File path

The GeoTIFF File to be created.

param.name: OPTIONS
param.dialogReference:
Creation Options

Text

A space separated list of key-value pairs (K=V).

tool.summary: The "GDAL GeoTIFF Export" tool exports one or more grids to a Geocoded Tagged Image File Format using the "Geospatial Data Abstraction Library" (GDAL) by Frank Warmerdam.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J. (2015): System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA) v. 2.1.4, Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 1991-2007, doi:10.5194/gmd-8-1991-2015. [SAGA - System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses - saga-gis.org]
